message: Let's split it 50/50 and be done with it!
I'll give you 40% if you accept now, it's a good deal!
I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
I'll give you 30% and take the rest, it's a fair deal!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm not going to let you get the better deal!
I'll give you a small piece of the pie, but I'm taking the majority!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm taking control of this negotiation!
I'll give you a tiny piece, but I'm taking the bulk of the cash!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm taking the lion's share, you're getting a tiny fraction!
This is my last stand, Bob. Take it or walk away!
I'll give you almost nothing, you're getting the scraps!
I'm not kidding, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm walking away.
